Wiersma Brothers

Where story meets craftsmanship

Find Out More

We are Wiersma Brothers,

three brothers specialised in the craft of visual storytelling. Our affinity with film drives us to make compelling, creative and well-tailored videos. We combine our backgrounds in product design, computer science and event management to quickly understand and translate your needs into powerful media.

Let's collaborate!

What we do

Videos

Short films, promotional videos, educational videos or live registration: we've done it all and we're here to help.

Photography

We aim to capture the best moments of your wedding, event, or portrait shoot in the best way possible.

Design

Get your idea or product communicated with designs that serve to function.
